website_summaries.verdict: This less-common La Croix flavor is refreshing, though not for everybody.
pros: Peach-pear is a somewhat unusual flavor pairing, so this would be great for impressing guests
Flavor wise, this La Croix is heavier on the peach than pear
cons: Like many La Croix flavors, some people love it and others don't

customer_reviews.title: The Best Soda Replacement We've Found
customer_reviews.text: This specific flavor, Peach-Pear, is my husband's favorite and it seems very difficult to find in the stores, as of lately. He has recently been diagnosed with diabetes and had previously been a 'soda pop' addict. La Croix was recommended for his new 'Paleo' diet (lifetime change) and he loves the 'hit' that it gives him, as soda did. I was so happy to find this flavor on Amazon and we now buy it on a regular basis,
customer_reviews.author: Weda

customer_reviews.title: Cans not labeled correctly?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Peach Pear La Croix. Went to drink one the other day, and though it was labeled "Peach Pear," it had the grapefruit flavor inside. I like that flavor so I wasn't mad, just shocked when I drank it and it wasn't what I was expecting. The boxes showed up disheveled from shipping and two cans died (were punctured, leaking, etc.) when delivered. Had to throw away.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Bar none healthy kind of Soft drink, I'll sing "Its the Sweet one" or the "Real Thing" anytime
customer_reviews.text: I do admit that I purchased La Croix at the Store and on Amazon. I like the peach pear much more than other flavors. I still not 100% on which flavor I like best because its all natural contains no artificial sweeteners such as High Fructose Corn Syrup and Aspartame. Some of these negative reviewers do not know what they are talking about why they don't like the taste some how. Rule of thumb on the major other brands of Soft Drink sellers. If it can remove chrome off a bumper of a beautiful restored Classic Car of the 1960's. You don't want the be consuming those type of soft drinks.
customer_reviews.author: William Jaroske

customer_reviews.title: MY FAVORITE FLAVOR!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite LaCroix flavor and is kind of hard to find in my little town. This came quick and was as described. If you haven't tried this flavor yet you are missing out!
customer_reviews.author: rlp219

customer_reviews.title: Great taste my favorite flavor
customer_reviews.text: Love the water! Great taste nothing added. What’s not to love?
customer_reviews.author: MeandIain

customer_reviews.title: Favorite soft drink.
customer_reviews.text: We have to always have this in our house, as it is the favorite of two family members.
customer_reviews.author: Truth Lover KB

customer_reviews.title: Way too good!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I'm one of the loyal drinkers of La Croix. I should tell you how awful it is so that I can keep it all for myself, but I cannot lie. No artificial taste or aftertaste. I just love this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Lo Kl

customer_reviews.title: For me, better than other flavors of La Croix
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how much I liked this drink! I don't like every version of La Croix, but I did enjoy this Peach-Pear flavor. It's a nice substitute to just plain water, if you're like me and don't like just plain water.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Gross flavor.
customer_reviews.text: I love La Croix, and was really excited to try this flavor. I didn't like it at all. It tasted like cheap wine. The fizz and smell was wonderful though, just not the flavor for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Quantity in the mail
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient getting a bulk quantity. Item was successfully packaged despite being so heavy for 24 cans.
customer_reviews.author: G. Hise

customer_reviews.title: Aunt Jemima
customer_reviews.text: The last two times I order this it came with a free box of aunt Jemima pancake mix. Not sure why?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Water
customer_reviews.text: The Seltzer water was great the flavor was pleasantly refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So good, the best flavor of all the La Croix waters
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: I love sparkling water and get the La Croix brand often
customer_reviews.text: I love sparkling water and get the La Croix brand often. I am a big fan of peach anything and I really did not like the peach pear flavor. I think it is heavier on the pear. I continued to drink them and it grew on me a little me - however, I don't foresee me buying more in this flavor. The other ones are much more enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: lalaabel

customer_reviews.title: Sparkling Water
customer_reviews.text: Ok... didn't send me as much as I thought it would. Probably won't order again.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: This is a great addition to my refrigerator for having a drink that ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to my refrigerator for having a drink that has a little flavor but no calories. I particularly like the Coconut and Grapefruit. My fiance loves the lime. They are much better than crystal geyser unfortunately more expensive. If you buy 5 cases you can get free shipping which is a big deal with some sellers. As a calorie free carbonated beverage free of chemicals it can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: John Mathon

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: I regret purchasing two of these. I know it says "natural" flavoring but the smell of peach pear was so strong it seemed unnatural and I couldn't drink them. I like the other flavors. Well, except coconut. And I am a fan of coconut.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: thank you for prompt shipping
customer_reviews.text: Gift for CGC Stratton crew members on lockdown due to COVID
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: I had to write a quick review of how wonderful these drinks are
customer_reviews.text: I did not purchase my La Croix drinks from Amazon, they are cheaper at my local grocery, however, I had to write a quick review of how wonderful these drinks are! I'm in love with this flavor as well. It has the perfect blend of peach and pear, though the pear is much more subtle. I love that it is not sweet, which makes it so much more refreshing! If I drink any other soda now it is entirely too sweet for me. This is, by far, my favorite brand of seltzer water!
customer_reviews.author: Casey Nicole

customer_reviews.title: yum
customer_reviews.text: My favorite flavor, along with coconut which I understand is one of the least popular? More for me I guess. I like to make simple syrup with it, just throw one can in a pot with about a cup of white sugar and heat/stir until it's all dissolved. Plenty to lightly sweeten & intensify the flavor in the rest of the pack if my sweet tooth is acting up and it's great with iced green tea too.
customer_reviews.author: LNCW

customer_reviews.title: My favorite La Croix flavor - more Pear-Peach than Peach-Pear though
customer_reviews.text: It's crazy the differences in people's taste buds. This is *easily* my favorite La Croix flavor. Slightly more pear than peach, but still fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: T-Rof007

customer_reviews.title: The Peach Pear La Croix
customer_reviews.text: This is a very unique fruit flavor combo. 100% natural sparkling water with just a hint of all natural peach and pear flavor Crisp, clean, and clear
customer_reviews.author: Professor H

customer_reviews.title: Awful Beyond Belief
customer_reviews.text: I understand that some things are an acquired taste. But this sewage treatment plant runoff is so foul that if Bear Grylls was stuck in the wilderness with a twelve pack of La Croix Peach-Pear Sparkling Water, he'd happily opt to keep drinking his own piss. Never. Again.
customer_reviews.author: StimpyTop Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: I am officially in love with La Croix sparking water beverages
customer_reviews.text: I am officially in love with La Croix sparking water beverages. While I did not order my drinks from Amazon, I will attest to the great flavor these drinks have. I would also like to point out that that they are less expensive in grocery stores...About $5+ less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: brizzzeee

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite flavor of la croix! The pear is subtle, but keeps the peach from being too sweet :)
customer_reviews.author: ann549

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as other flavors
customer_reviews.text: I was buying another flavor of La Croix, and another shopper in the store told me I had to try the peach-pear flavor. I did and I must be the only one who doesn't like it. The pear taste is too strong. It lacks the subtly of other sparkling water. I will admit that after drinking about 6 cans, it's begun to taste a little better. Maybe I'm just getting used to it, but I'm probably not going to buy this flavor again.
customer_reviews.author: Austin K.

customer_reviews.title: Acquired Taste
customer_reviews.text: This is an acquired taste like wine or so they say. Taste too much like pear and unnatural. Maybe sweetened with Stevia drops would have made it bearable. It was expensive so I just gave it to my mom as she has the acquired palette. So disgusting dont buy if your new to no sugar. Cran- rasberry was better.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: La Croix ~ overall good quality.  Yet,  this flavor was a strange pairing imho
customer_reviews.text: The peach flavoring was subtle and light. Yet, the pear left an unpleasant aftertaste, the taste was artificial. Maybe it was the can? I have tried lime, lemon, grapefruit and all those flavors were subtle and natural. I would recommend buying one can at a local store firs before jumping into a case.
customer_reviews.author: LaChatteHeureuse

customer_reviews.title: No ma'am
customer_reviews.text: Just disgusting. There's way too much pear flavor, and it tastes so artificial that it almost reminds me of banana. Will not ever purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew C.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I recommend everyone to just buy 1 can to try out before buying a whole box. This tasted *too much* like medicine and my mother hated it too. I will be sticking to other sparkling waters.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the taste of these, and they are Whole30 approved!
customer_reviews.author: L. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: It tastes like bubble bath liquid
customer_reviews.text: This flavor is awful. It tastes like bubble bath liquid. Stick with other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Harmon

product_meta.title: La Croix Peach Pear Sparkling Water, 12 Ounce (24 Cans)
product_meta.description: Natural flavor sparkling water. Calorie, sweetener, sodium free. All natural.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
